column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday August 27 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Closures Scheduled for New Circle Rd at Georgetown Rd:
column4: 9 p.m. Monday August 26 to 6 a.m. Tuesday August 27.

column3: Closures Scheduled for New Circle Rd at Georgetown Rd:
column4: New Circle Rd CLOSED in both directions.  Traffic directed up and over the exit ramps.

column3: Closures Scheduled for New Circle Rd at Georgetown Rd:
column4: No thru traffic on the Georgetown Rd bridge.

column3: Closures Scheduled for New Circle Rd at Georgetown Rd:
column4: The closures are necessary for a crew to set beams for the new bridge.
